title: How is Byju's learning app helpful? What are the enrollment fees? - Quora

response.answer_text: Byjus helps the students by providing quality learning programs for every type of student. New-age learning programs like byjus will help children to overcome the fear of exams and stop the practice of rote learning and initiate learning on their own. The app offers interactive, fun and engaging learning programs that adapts to every child’s learning requirements. The learning app provides effective and engaging learning programs to students through videos, which helps them understand complex concepts in a better and easier manner. The app helps students understand concepts by relating it to real life examples. It also allows every student to learn the subject at their own pace, with interactive tasks to ensure a thorough understanding of each subject. Additionally, parents can also closely monitor their child’s progress and guide their child too. Overall, the high quality learning modules, videos and interactives offered by byjus across grades, will help students experience learning in the most personalised and effective format - a format that will help them fall in love with learning.
